name: Yatzy Modern
description:
~~~~~50% OFF! LIMITIED TIME SALE! Happy Pioneer Day (or "Pie and Beer" Day)! ~~~~~

The classic dice game we all know and love, now with a clean, modern interface. If you call your self a Yazty addict, this is the game for you. Now you can keep track of all the game you play and even compete with your friends for the top spot on the leaderboard!
